Subject: First Landing
Message-ID: <8hvabl+h793@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 3492
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: "Ultra Optimus " <highlordtemplar@...>

Okay, I'm new here, so if this sounds a little crappy, please excuse 
me, since its my first time.

----------------------------------------------------------------------
A big Maximal ship appears just beyond the atmosphere of earth, by 
the looks of it, it is seriously damaged, and it is slowly dirfting 
toward earth. Its occupants are all permenantly offline. The only bot 
functional, is locked up inside a detention cell. The bot, beats at 
the forcefeild grid. Then he gets a idea. He reaches for his EMP 
blaster, and puts it on low energy. he releases a small blast, that 
barely weakens the grid, but not wasting any time, the bot starts 
rapidly punching the grid, when under all the pressure. The grid 
breaks. The bot, then runs for the armory, and quickly finds a empty 
cargo crate and stuffs very armament into it , stuffing it up fully, 
and heads out to the escape pods, only to find that all of them are 
taken. he finds a control panel, and brings up a schematic for the 
ship, and he quickly finds what he is looking for. He then reaches 
the small cargo transport, after a trek across the entire ship. When 
he steps inside he sees a barely functional maximal engineer, the 
engineer reaches to him and pleads for help. The rogue maximal no 
longer has any feelings of kindness, and for revenge of locking him 
up in a detention cell, he grabs the engineer's hand in a deceitfully 
kind way, and suddenly twists it off. The engineer, writhing in pain 
is in total fright, then the rogue, grabs the engineer's neck, and 
starts applying pressure, and then snaps it. He reaches for his 
plasma chain gun, and puts literally thousands of holes into the 
engineer's body. All that his left is a head, neck, and a stem that 
used to be a spine. With that done, he takes the controls of the 
ship, and steers it out of the hanger, and into the earth atmosphere. 
After putting the ship on auto pilot, the rogue, know as Ultra 
Optimus, opens the cargo crate to look at his loot. Inside are, spare 
parts. Looks like the inhabitants of the ship were expecting a 
war...... There were 2 shoulder mounted missile packs, with 3 
missiles each, along with 2 mini-fusion pistols, 1 plasma blaster-
rifle edition, a fusion pulse chain gun, and a holder for those 
weapons that was meant to be attached the bot's back. Also in the 
crate were 2 radiation type weapons, one was a iridium chain gun, 
which was capable of shredding enemies, and finally, a beam sabre. 
Seeing all these weapons, Ultra Optimus decides that he can only take 
3 weapons, so he decides on the one of the pistols, the rifle sized 
blaster, and finally, the fusion pulse chain gun. Then, he is 
informed by the ship that, they have landed, and that he must choose, 
a beast mode so that he could repair without the ship's CR chamber. 
Then the auto scan for life forms starts, but Ultra Optimus halts it, 
and because of hear a tale about dragons, he decides on a mythical 
dragon. The computer, complies, and searches its database on a 
dragon, until it finds a dragon-like form, but because of its 
extensive size, it must be made with metal, not flesh, and bones. 
After that is decided, Ultra Optimus decides he will need an extra 
form in case of emergency. Since he had always wanted to be a flyer 
like Star Scream, but stronger, he decides to be a Missile Bomber. 
The computer then complies, and gives him the necessary forms. Ultra 
Optimus then heads out of the ship, with no exact goal in mind.
